name: Four In A Row (MJH Games)
description:
This is a replica of the classic board game. The rules are the same as the original - you win by getting 4 counters in a row. It's a single player version where you play against the computer.

The music is generated based on the positions of the counters on the board, and is very unlikely to sound the same for 2 different games. There are 823543 different variations of the music!

Supports keyboard or controller input.

Game design, music and sound: Matt Hart

Background art: K Hart
